original_text: Yes, we really wanted to return to you. Certainly, I, Paul, tried again and again to come to you, but Satan stopped us.
korean_text: 그러므로 나 바울은 한번 두번 너희에게 가고자 하였으나 사탄이 우리를 막았도다

sentences.original_text: Yes, we really wanted to return to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 네, 우리는 정말로 당신들에게 돌아가고 싶었습니다.

sentences.original_text: Certainly, I, Paul, tried again and again
sentences.korean_translation: 확실히, 나 바울은 여러 번 시도했습니다.
